ygData.subject: Grinnen Charm?
ygData.msgSnippet: While passing through N Karana the other day, I was given the opportunity of looting a Griffene Charm off a slain Griffene.  I looted it, thanked the Ogre that
ygData.messageBody:
While passing through N Karana the other day, I was given the opportunity of
looting a Griffene Charm off a slain Griffene. I looted it, thanked the
Ogre that had supplied the kill, and sped off on my merry way. Later,
however, I took a closer look at it. It looks just like a Griffene charm,
is bard-only, +3 CHA. But it's a Grinnene Charm, not a Griffene Charm! Is
this a typo, something to trick the inattentive bard out of our hard-earned
money, or just something else?

Has anyone seen this before? I don't blame the Ogre for false advertising..
First of all, he's an Ogre... heheeh, and secondly I didn't have to pay
anything for it... But I'd sure like to know if I'm wasting precious bank
storage for just a piece of cheap jewelry... lol

Olgwinn
Bard of the 19th Song
E'Ci
